mapper.select: select count(1) from member_login_log where TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(now(), `last_heart_time`)) <= 60
select count(1) from member where to_days(created_at) = to_days(now())
select count(1) from file_transfer where to_days(created_at) = to_days(now()) and pay_status = 'S'
select sum(second) from file_transfer where to_days(created_at) = to_days(now()) and pay_status = 'S'
select count(1) from order_info where to_days(order_at) = to_days(now()) and status = 'S';
select sum(amount) from order_info where to_days(order_at) = to_days(now()) and status = 'S';
select date_format(created_at, '%m-%d') as `date`, count(1) as num from member where date_sub(curdate(), interval 29 day) <= created_at group by date_format(created_at, '%m-%d')

select date_format(created_at, '%m-%d') as `date`, count(1) as filetransCount from file_transfer where date_sub(curdate(), interval 29 day) <= created_at and pay_status = 'S' group by date_format(created_at, '%m-%d')

select date_format(created_at, '%m-%d') as `date`, sum(second) as filetransSecond from filetrans where date_sub(curdate(), interval 29 day) <= created_at and pay_status = 'S' group by date_format(created_at, '%m-%d')

select date_format(`order_at`, '%m-%d') as `date`, count(1) as orderCount from order_info where date_sub(curdate(), interval 29 day) <= `order_at` and status = 'S' group by date_format(`order_at`, '%m-%d')

select date_format(`order_at`, '%m-%d') as `date`, sum(amount) as orderAmount from order_info where date_sub(curdate(), interval 29 day) <= `order_at` and status = 'S' group by date_format(`order_at`, '%m-%d')
